rulesContent:
• **Be respectful** – No harassment or hate speech.

• **No RDM/VDM** – Stay in character and follow roleplay rules.

• **Voice in character** – Use your mic when in-game where required.

• Join our Discord for full rules and applications.
latestNewsContent:
**New season** – Economy and jobs have been updated.

*Weekend event* – Community meet this Saturday. Check Discord for times.

Thank you for playing – report bugs and suggestions in #feedback.
